name: The Lone Pianist in SPAAAA...
description:
Made for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam "Only One"

You are the only crew member left on a spaceship, manage tasks above your pay grade while you pursue your one true passion: the piano.

Controls:

Move-- arrow keys

Interact-- Z

Mini Games:

Ladders-- Press Z multiple times to climb!

Telescope-- Lookout for the oncoming Bad Cheese Planet!

Steering Wheel-- Steer away from the Bad Cheese Planet!

Fueling-- Press Z multiple times to drop the coal into the furnace!

Hammer-- It does nothing it just looks cool :^)

Credits (Twitter):

Music--@TeeTaan360

Programming--@tamiks_properer

Art--[F]
